initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Telintel Enterprise Platform?
easy to use the tool, best messaging platform, can be used in mobile for marketing and messaging

What do you dislike about Telintel Enterprise Platform?
nothing at the moment as it is very helpful to interact easily with my clients

What problems is Telintel Enterprise Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
it is used to send two-way messages, monitor and sent messages and manage campaigns for marketing and sales
